field.name: commitment_date
field.decoration-danger: ( ( commitment_date < effective_date or commitment_date < datetime.datetime.combine( datetime.date.today(), datetime.time(0,0,0) ).to_utc().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') ) and delivery_status in ['pending', 'started'] and effective_date <= commitment_date or delivery_status == 'partial' )
